extension.description:
An enhanced port of Genesis Plus to the libretro API. Support for SG-1000, Mark-III, Master System, Game Gear, Mega Drive & Mega CD hardware. Enhancements backported by twinaphex from the GX version (Gamecube/Wii port).
Supported files: .md, .smd, .bin, .cue, .gen, .iso, .sms, .gg, .sg
Source: https://github.com/libretro/Genesis-Plus-GX
